Since 1993, ACM Multimedia has been bringing together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to present innovative research results and discuss recent advancements. Check @ACMMM19 website for more details: https://t.co/QroXuO8ZAV#ACMMM #Multimedia #Research

@ACMMM19 is structured around four themes (alphabetical):Engaging users with multimediaMultimedia experienceMultimedia systemsUnderstanding multimedia contentMultimedia research focuses on integration of the multiple perspectives offered by different digital modalities.

ACM Multimedia 2019: First Call for Papers/Call for Contributions@ACMMM19 is the premier international conference in the area of multimedia within the field of computer science.  Details on the conference themes are available on the conference website: https://t.co/QroXuO8ZAV
